metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12665 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.6-2 has a memory leak vulnerability in WritePICTImage in coders/pict.c.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> 0134-memory-leak-in-WritePICTImage.patch in unstable 0282-CVE-2017-12665-Fix-memory-leak-in-WritePICTImage.patch in wheezy not fixing memory leak in trusty and xenial

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
